acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill POJOs with non default constructors
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillPojosWithNonDefaultConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NoDefaultConstructorPojo
Then the Object NoDefaultConstructorPojo ( intField = -1609769630 ) should not be null
